member.name: IApplicationDestinations.RemoveAllDestinations
member.summary: Clears all destination entries from the Recent and Frequent categories in an application's Jump List.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IApplicationDestinations.RemoveDestination
member.summary: Removes a single destination from the Recent and Frequent categories in a Jump List.
member.param: A pointer to the or that represents the destination to remove.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a standard COM error value otherwise. If the object pointed to by punk is not an or , the method returns E_INVALIDARG.

member.name: IApplicationDestinations.SetAppID
member.summary: Specifies a unique Application User Model ID (AppUserModelID) for the application from whose taskbar button's Jump List the methods of this interface will remove destinations. This method is optional.
member.param: Pointer to the AppUserModelID of the process whose taskbar button representation receives the Jump List.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IApplicationDestinations
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow an application to remove one or all destinations from the Recent or Frequent categories in a Jump List.
